channel.title: KevinCTofel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from KevinCTofel.

item.description:
Picked up the new Acer Chromebook Spin 714 and saw one Octane score over 80,000. üò≤ Below is the slowest test. Overall, just a smidge faster than the HP Elite Dragonfly. Core i5 in the Acer, Core i3 in the HP. https://t.co/rwGXDqk3tV

Early, early take but so far, this Chromebook at the current $629 sale price seems to be an excellent value. Not as refined as the Dragonfly, but that's to be expected. https://t.co/Y0E0fqMomV
item.source:markdown:
Picked up the new Acer Chromebook Spin 714 and saw one Octane score over 80,000. üò≤ Below is the slowest test. Overall, just a smidge faster than the HP Elite Dragonfly. Core i5 in the Acer, Core i3 in the HP. https://t.co/rwGXDqk3tV
Early, early take but so far, this Chromebook at the current $629 sale price seems to be an excellent value. Not as refined as the Dragonfly, but that's to be expected. https://t.co/Y0E0fqMomV

item.description: @Leopeva64 Yup, I saw that one yesterday after spending about 2 hours reading through gerrit code. Looks like they're still figuring out the implementation.
item.source:markdown: @Leopeva64 Yup, I saw that one yesterday after spending about 2 hours reading through gerrit code. Looks like they're still figuring out the implementation.

item.description: @Leopeva64 Thanks, I hadn‚Äôt seen that, nor the details in the code that I shared in my post. If I had, I probably would have written it up back then.
item.source:markdown: @Leopeva64 Thanks, I hadn‚Äôt seen that, nor the details in the code that I shared in my post. If I had, I probably would have written it up back then.

item.description: That was fast. The 2022 Acer Chromebook Spin 714 discount price is $629, down $100 from its launch price in early July. https://t.co/Y0E0fqMomV
